summary: Add login-gated access with a pre-login trial mode: unauthenticated users can view feature previews and play limited trial games, but cannot use the full website until logging in.
architectural_notes: Implement route/feature access control based on authentication state, with explicit allowlist for pre-login preview/trial areas.
Keep changes focused to avoid impacting existing CRUD/features outside auth gating.

existing_features.title: Add an unauthenticated (pre-login) experience that allows users to (a) view a feature preview and (b) play a limited set of trial games, while preventing access to the rest of the app until they log in.

Implement navigation/access gating so unauthenticated users cannot access any non-trial pages/modules (including pages accessible via internal navigation state), and are redirected back to the pre-login experience with an English message prompting them to log in.

Limit the Games Hub and game launching behavior for unauthenticated users to a defined trial set of games; all other games must be visibly locked and attempting to open them must prompt the user to log in (English text).

new_feature_requests.summary: Gate full website functionality behind login; unauthenticated users cannot use the site beyond allowed preview/trial areas
Provide pre-login experience: allow viewing features and playing some games as a trial before authentication

projectName: Gate full app behind login with pre-login feature preview + limited trial games
